attributes.action: allow the English people to decide, by referendum, whether Scotland should remain part of the Union
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is a movement in Scotland for independence.  As the English fund the Scottish parliament and have many Scottish MPs determining their future, it is unreasonable and unbalanced that the English do not have a reciprocal say in their relationship with the Scottish.  This petition is designed to address that imbalance, once and for all
